org.lwjgl.opencl

Interface CLNativeKernel.Buf

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CLNativeKernel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLNativeKernel.BufAdapter
    Enclosing interface:
    CLNativeKernel 

    public static interface CLNativeKernel.Buf
extends CLNativeKernel
    Extends CLNativeKernel with an alternative version that accepts a buffer.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        void invoke(java.nio.ByteBuffer args)
        The native kernel implementation.
        Parameters:
        args - the native kernel arguments. In the default implementation, this will be null if the enqueued arguments buffer for this native kernel did not have space for anything other than 2 pointers.
